title: Crestmore: The Lost Elmkey
description: Magic is dead.... But not forgotten.In a country crushed by a foreign superpower, daily survival is no mean feat. Hope for a better tomorrow?Impossible.Until Jacob Crestmore finds a link to an ancient artefact with the power to awaken elemental magic. Can he throw off the shackles of his past to free his people?Or will a family secret put an end to his efforts once and for all?
author: Sean  Clarke
